title: Kleitor
description: An ancient city of Arcadia in the Peloponnese. The site of ancient Kleitor lies at the western end of a valley; modern Kleitoria lies at the eastern end.

properties.description: Location determined in Google earth after plans by Leake and Petritaki, reproduced in Maher 2015 and with reference to geolocated photographs in Google Earth by Kyprianos Biris. Dates after BAtlas (may not be correct for theater).
properties.title: Imagery Location: Theater of Kleitor

properties.description: Location determined in Google Earth after plan by Petritaki reproduced in Maher 2015.
properties.title: Imagery Location: West Gate of Kleitor
